abstract: Sanofi-Aventis and Merck announced Thursday that the two companies had agreed for Merck to sell its stake in their animal-health joint venture Merial for $4 billion in cash.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis and Merck announced Thursday that the two companies had agreed for Merck to sell its stake in their animal-health joint venture Merial for $4 billion in cash.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis said Thursday it had agreed to buy Merck & Company’s 50 percent stake in Merial, an animal-health joint venture, for $4 billion in cash.

headline.main: Sanofi and Merck Announce $4 Billion Merial Sale
